p: The height, fresh and dry weights of tomato plants, in addition to root fresh and dry weights and root dry matter did not significantly differ between treatments (31 days after planting), concluding that NEMguard Â® DE had no phytotoxic effect on the plants ( Table 3). In addition, 59 days after planting, the root fresh weight did not differ significantly among treatments and controls ( Table S1). These findings are in line with other studies, which report no side effects on plants, when using garlic oil, diallyl disulfide or diallyl trisulfide or garlic essential oil vapor [ 20, 28].
